text: Just for today, I am enough.
One day at a time, one moment at a time.
Progress, not perfection.
I am worthy of recovery and peace.
My past does not define my future.
I choose connection over isolation today.
I am stronger than my cravings.
Recovery is a journey, not a destination.
I am learning to trust the process.
Today I choose health and healing.
I am grateful for another day clean.
I can handle today's challenges.
I am building a life I don't need to escape from.
Every moment clean is a victory.
I deserve to be happy, joyous, and free.
I am part of a loving fellowship.
My sobriety is my superpower.
I am becoming who I was meant to be.
Today, I choose courage over comfort.
I am healing one day at a time.
I trust my Higher Power's plan for me.
I am exactly where I need to be.
My recovery is worth fighting for.
I choose peace over chaos today.
I am learning to love myself.
Small steps lead to big changes.
I am grateful for the gift of recovery.
Today I will be gentle with myself.
I am building a foundation of honesty.
My life has meaning and purpose.
